Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

Straight from the Posleen War, this monstrosity weighs in at 185 tons, firing nuclear shells (courtesy North Kerbin Dynamics) up to thirty kilometers. Really, this is my magnum opus- the only fictional tank that eclipses the SheVa for sheer mind-numbing power would be the BOLO, and I don't think a tank the size of a medium island would work all that well in KSP...

"Let's rock, Posleen-boy!"

Download: KerbalX

Edited October 12, 2015 by Kagame
Oops, download link.

Heh. Glad to see another Ringo fan here!

That said... now someone needs to make that big-ass gun from the SheVa so we can shoot stuff in orbit... or beyond.
I know, right- the Nuclear Valentine I used is like a tenth the size that the SheVa gun is. I also wonder if it would be possible to implement HE/nuke/APDS round switching in BDA.... hmm.
